summary: Client Sarah requested to start a requirements meeting. The PM asked for a project name; Architect, Developer, and QA provided no input (not_addressed).

actions.task: Initiate the requirements meeting and circulate an agenda to stakeholders
Propose a name for the project

risks.risk: Key stakeholders (Architect, Developer, QA) did not provide input during the meeting, risking incomplete requirements.
risks.mitigation: Follow up with each stakeholder for their input and schedule a dedicated session to capture missing requirements; set clear deadlines for responses.
